name: Goldnight Commander
originalText: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: The creature that entered the battlefield will also get +1/+1 until end of turn if it’s still on the battlefield when the ability resolves.
